=jSocket Object=

==Constructor==

=== jSocket() ===
Contructor of our jSocket Object. 
Internal id registration takes place here.


==Methods==

===jSocket.setup(target)===
Call this method to setup the socket.
setup takes the required parameter target, which should contain a [http://docs.jquery.com/Selectors jQuery Selector] that points to a container where jSocket will place the flash file in.

===jSocket.connect(host, port)===

===jSocket.send(data)===

===jSocket.close()===


==Events

===jSocket.onReady()===

===jSocket.onConnect(success)===

===jSocket.onData(data)===

===jSocket.onClose()===
